漈字的基本解释

漈
jì
岸边：河边水漈。
海底深陷处：“至彭湖渐低，近瑠求谓之落漈，漈者，趋下而不回也。”
方言，瀑布：百丈漈；梅花漈（均在中国福建省）。

漈字的起名意思

指海底深处，水边或是瀑布。

riverbank
Basic explanation of words
riverbank
jì
Shore: The river is flooded with water.
Deep in the bottom of the sea: "When Penghu Lake is gradually lowering, the nearer seeks to say that it will fall, and the one who will go down will not return."
Dialect, waterfall: Baizhangji; Meihuaji (both in Fujian Province, China).

Name meaning
Refers to the depths of the ocean floor, waterside or waterfall.
jì
сущ.
